1.content:
It was the summer holidays and coming up to Emily's birthday, the only problem was that all her friends where away on holiday with there family's. Thus got her down a bit as it was her 18th and no one to celebrate with. Emily was a short girl at 4'2" tall and small A cup breasts, she had red hair flowing down to her butt.

Emily is a playful but shy girl. She has a few friends but her closest is a guy called Phil. For the last few years she been waiting for him to ask her out, he is a few years older and in university.

Emily was trying to decide on what to do as all her other friends where out of town.
1.title: Emilys wish

11.content:
Emily goes up to her room and pick up her mobile phone and scrolls though her contacts as she flops onto the bed.

The phone rings as she waits on Phil to answer, after a few rings he answers.

"Hey Emily" he says cheerfully

"Phil you have to come round" Emily nearly shouts down the phone.

"OK I'll be over in a few" he replys as he hangs up and heads to Emily's
11.title: Call Phil over

choices: Emily has something to show Phil.
Emily has had a really bad day.
111.content: Curious about the urgency in Emily's voice, Phil drives around to her house. He parks up and rings the doorbell. Emily answers the door within seconds and invites him in. "Emily, whatever is it you want to talk about so urgently?" Phil enquires.
111.title: Arriving at Emily's

1111.content:
As Emily drags Phil in and shuts the door, she takes him to the lounge.
"I made a wish, watch"

Slowly her small breasts start to expand and grow to a D cup. "ain't this amazing" she shouts as she shrinks them back and then looks at Phil.

"I remember you had a fetish" she smiles as with a thought she gives Phil the ability to shrink down to 1" tall and to grow to 10' tall, she increases his strenght to that of super man and also the ability to come back to life and remake his body. All this along with the knowledge
1111.title: Emily has something to show Phil.

choices: Phil tries but it doesn't seem to work.
Phil shrinks down to about 1.5 inches tall.
11111.content:
Phil looks startled and amazed. "Will it really work?" he asks Emily? I can shrink and come back to normal size again?"

Emily nods and tells Phil to try.
11111.title: Phil's reaction

111112.content: Emily watch's as Phil slowly starts to shrink, as he shrinks he gets faster until he is 1.5" tall. Emily smiles as she looks down on him then lifts her foot over him. "lets try the best bit" she smiles as she stomps down on him. His blood and guts splat out from under her shoe, moving her foot she watcha his dead remains and waits
111112.title: Phil shrinks down to about 1.5 inches tall.

info.brief_description: A woman makes a wish and it comes true.
info.description:
A girl has her 16th birthday and makes a wish as she blows her candles out...

no ending the world
no growing bigger that 500 foot (can but not permanently)
but all other things are allowed
